Welcome

Mortgage Calculator is a handy app to help you shop around for your home loan or mortgage. The app has been designed to allow fast data entry and show you your monthly mortgage repayment promptly.

Mortgage

Enter the amount of money you wish to borrow. Press the button showing the amount, a box will appear that allows you to enter your value. Alternatively you can press the +/- buttons to adjust.

Period

The period is the number of years you wish to borrow over.

Rate

The rate is the annual (yearly) interest rate that your mortgage provider will charge you, the rate is shown as a percentage.

Monthly Repayment

The monthly repayment is the amount you have to pay back each month. This figure includes both the interest and mortgage loan repayment and is calculated immediately for your convenience.

Settings

Slide the screen to the settings tab, here you can choose one of the many exciting background colors.

Share

You can share your mortgage details with other apps such as e-Mail or text messages apps if available. On the menu press the share icon or option.
